name: Joeney
description:
Joeney is a 3d platformer where you the main character Joe goes around unique areas training to "jump" better than anyone.

This was a university project about working with a client, my topic from the client was "cheater" (the game must have a mechanic that allows the player to cheat in a way). This game was developed in 4.5 weeks, It started very slow with 2 weeks of programming movement alone this project might be continued, for now, i don't have too much time but I am interested in adding more to it.

known bugs: high score changes if the score is higher or lower than the score

I was the only person on this project but had lots of help from multiple amazing programmers studying at my uni (AIE) and some other friend of mine
